com.percussion.extension
Interface IPSExtensionDefFactory

public interface IPSExtensionDefFactory

The IPSExtensionDefFactory interface defines methods for serializing and deserializing whole extension defs. Each class which implements IPSExtensionDef should have a corresponding class which implements IPSExtensionDefFactory.

Method Summary
 IPSExtensionDef fromXml(Element defElement)
          Creates a new extension def instance of the proper derived type from the given XML element, which is analogous to the serialized content created from toXml.
 Element toXml(Element root, IPSExtensionDef def)
          Convenience method that calls toXml(root, def, false).
 Element toXml(Element root, IPSExtensionDef def, boolean excludeMethods)
          Serializes the content of the given extension def into a newly created element under the given root element.
 

Method Detail

toXml

Element toXml(Element root,
              IPSExtensionDef def)
Convenience method that calls toXml(root, def, false).

toXml

Element toXml(Element root,
              IPSExtensionDef def,
              boolean excludeMethods)
Serializes the content of the given extension def into a newly created element under the given root element.

Parameters:
root - The element under which the extension def element will be created. Must not be null.
def - The extension definition to be serialized. Must not be null.
excludeMethods - true to exclude the extension methods from serialization, false to include.
Returns:
The newly created element under root. Never null.

fromXml

IPSExtensionDef fromXml(Element defElement)
                        throws PSExtensionException
Creates a new extension def instance of the proper derived type from the given XML element, which is analogous to the serialized content created from toXml.

Parameters:
defElement - The top-level extension def element. Must not be null.
Returns:
A new IPSExtensionDef instance of the proper derived type, representing the serialized content. Never null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the element content is missing or corrupted.
